pages.text: Often the first of the magical herbs to be discovered, wildroot is the remnants of the once common & beautiful $(l:resources/wildwood)wildwood tree$(), now extinct.$(br2)Found when breaking tall grass and the like, it is an essential part of early stages of this mod.$(br2)$(info) $(l:herbs/wildroot#renew)While renewable$(), the spell $(l:spells/natures_scythe)Nature's Scythe$() may also prove useful in obtaining it.

As a renewable resource, wildroot can be planted directly onto any farmland (including all variants of $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soil$() as well as any other types of farmland you may encounter).$(br2)Once planted, it will split into a cluster of roots with fresh green growth that is trimmed away upon harvesting.
